ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class Bid

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.Bid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Bid>

    public class Bid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Bid>, java.io.Serializable
    Bid provides a model of a bid, with a user and a price, that is strictly contained by a task
    See Also:
    Task, User, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bid(Price value, RemoteReference<User> bidder)
      creates a Bid from a value and a remote reference to a User.
      Bid(Price value, User bidder)
      creates a Bid from a value and a bidder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(Bid bid)
      returns 1 if this is smaller in price than bid, -1 if greater, 0 if equal
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      determines if bids are equal based on if their bidders and values are equal

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bid

        public Bid(Price value,
           RemoteReference<User> bidder)
        creates a Bid from a value and a remote reference to a User. this should not be used in favour of Bid(Double, User)
        Parameters:
        value - the price the bidder will work for
        bidder - a RemoteReference to the bidder

        public User getRemoteBidder(ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.RemoteClient rc)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        gets the bidder from a client, dereferencing the bidder
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Bid bid)
        returns 1 if this is smaller in price than bid, -1 if greater, 0 if equal
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Bid>
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        determines if bids are equal based on if their bidders and values are equal
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:

        Returns:
